meanings.definition: A container with small holes in the top, used to sprinkle salt onto food.
meanings.sent1: I always reach for the saltshakers when my food needs a bit more flavor.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant table had elegant saltshakers to season the dishes.
meanings.sent3: The saltshakers on the table were having a party, shaking salt all around!
meanings.sent4: Her words fell from her lips like salt from the saltshakers, adding just the right touch to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The saltshakers on the picnic table gleamed in the sunlight, inviting us to season our meal.
